name: WiZmans World ReTry
storyline: In order to restore the world, a young amnesic sorcerer goes on an adventure. On his journey, he befriends three homunculus girls. They can change their appearances and their abilities via a training system called “Anima Fusion,” which requires to collect and fuse the souls of the monsters you fight.
summary: This is a remaster of Jaleco’s RPG WiZmans World released in 2010 on Nintendo DS, now in HD with a 16:9 screen ratio.
